amendment.description: To increase funding for the Low Income Home Energy Assistance Program.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 1588 withdrawn in Senate.
Amendment SA 1588 proposed by Senator Bingaman. (consideration: CR S11297-11299; text: CR S11297) To increase funding for the Low Income Home Energy Assistance Program.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1588 proposed by Senator Bingaman.
